resources.string: You have not added any favorites market.
Quote asset and base asset cannot be the same.
Please select the asset to borrow
Please enter the debt value first.
The network is abnormal. Please refresh the interface again.
The asset has been global settled and cannot update position.
The asset has no feed data and and cannot update position
The ratio cannot be lower than %s.
You are already in a forced sale and you cannot reduce the ratio.
The amount of borrowings and collateral did not change.
%s balance is insufficient, please adjust the amount of repayment.
The ratio is lower than %s and you cannot borrow more.
Update position successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.

[Tips]
1. When the feed price drops to the call price, the system will automatically sell your collateral assets for debt repayment. Please pay attention to adjusting the ratio control risks. 
2. When the debt field is locked, the ratio will change with the collateral. 
3. When the ratio field is locked, the debt will change with the collateral.
[Tips] \nThe current asset is a predicted market asset. The amount of borrowing and collateral is constant at 1: 1.
The current account login status is invalid, please log in again.
The mining data server or network is abnormal. Please try again later.
Multi-signature accounts do not support viewing mining data.

(1) Referrer locked position no less than %s NBS (including MINER and regular lock position). \n(2) The holdings of NBS locked position by referrer must more than the recommended account; otherwise, the margin will not be included in the valid invitation holdings.

(1) You need to hold no less than %s SCNY. \n(2) The number of SCNY holdings by yourself must more than the recommended account; otherwise, the margin will not be included in the valid invitation holdings.
All NBS accounts of locked position (including periodic locked position and MINER) are equally allocated %s NCN from pool output per day based on the amount holdings.
All SCNY holding accounts are equally allocated %s NCN from pool output per day based on the amount holdings.
The recommended daily revenue of locked position mining is: (valid invitation holdings) × %s%%.
The recommended daily revenue from mortgage mining is: (valid invitation holdings) x %s%%.
The album could not be accessed for system reasons.
Please go to the settings interface to allow the app to access the camera.
This feature is not supported without camera permissions.
Put the QR code inside the border.
The payee is the same as the payment account.
The current gateway service is not available. please try again later.
Minimum deposits number: %s%s. Less than the minimum amount will not be credited and cannot be returned.\n
Send only %s to this deposit address. Sending Non-%s to this address will lose it.
After you have deposited the above address, please wait for the network to confirm.\n
Your deposit will be deposited after %s confirmations from the network.\n
If you have any questions, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request deposits address is abnormal, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request deposits address is abnormal, the field \"%s\" verification failed, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request withdraw address is abnormal, please contact the gateway customer service.
The query intermediate account information failed.
Please enter or paste the withdraw address
Please enter a memo or a tag
The withdraw address cannot be empty.
Cannot be less than the minimum amount.
The actual number is too low.
The memo private key is missing and the withdraw is not supported.
Once the withdraw request is issued, it will be irrevocable. Please make sure that your withdraw address and memo are correct.
Memo is missing. Do you continue to withdraw?
Once the withdraw request is issued, it will be irrevocable. Please make sure that your withdraw address is correct.
Submit the withdraw request successfully, but refresh failed, please try again later.
Multi-signature and other functions only support wallet mode. Do you want to create a local wallet file for the current account?
Dear Life Member, you are entitled to an 80% fee cashback.
Upgrade lifetime membership and enjoy an 80% fee cashback.
Upgrade lifetime membership is successful, but refreshing the interface failed, please try again later.
Upgrade lifetime membership will cost %s, do you want to continue?
Please enter a valid public key.
The memo key has not changed.
Change memo key is successful, but refreshing interface data failed, please try again later.
You can only add up to %s multi-sign authorities.
[Tips]\nThreshold: The threshold is the minimum weight required to use the permission. The sum of the weights of each authority must be greater than or equal to the threshold.
Please enter a valid threshold. Range 1 - 9999999.
Please re-adjust the threshold and weight. The sum of the weights of all authority must be greater than or equal to the threshold.
The new authority list contains the public key type. Please confirm that you must hold the corresponding private key. Do you want to continue changing permissions?
Change permission is a dangerous operation. Please confirm that the new authority list is configured correctly. Do you want to continue changing permissions?
The permission change was successful. Please login again.
The permission change was successful, but refresh account info failed. Please exit and restart the app.
Please enter a valid account or public key.
Please enter a valid weight value. Range 1 - 65535.
Copying passwords may be risky, do you want to continue?

[Reminder] \nPlease use a pen and paper to record the password consisting of the above %s characters in order from left to right and from top to bottom, and keep it in a safe place. Once lost, it cannot be retrieved.
Enter the password from the prev step
Please confirm again that you have saved the new password and saved it in a safe place. Continue?
Please make sure that your password has been copied and saved to a safe place. If it is lost, it cannot be retrieved.
Contain more than 2 and non-continuous uppercase letters
Composed of letters, numbers, or hyphens
End with a letter or number
Please enter a mnemonic, separated by spaces between each word.
Please enter a new wallet password
The account number consists of lowercase letters, numbers, -, ., and must end with a letter beginning with a letter or number.
More than 12 characters and must contain uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
More than 8 characters and must contain uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
This device does not support importing wallet files.
An unknown error occurred and the wallet could not be imported. Please try again later.
Please enter the above URL on the computer to import the wallet BIN file to the phone.
The device network is abnormal. You cannot import the wallet at this time. Please try again later.
Only supports importing wallets via WIFI network.
Failed to read the wallet file.
The wallet file is invalid or the password is incorrect.
This wallet is not a New Bitshares wallet.
The wallet is empty, please re-select.
The wallet contains multiple accounts and does not support import.
The wallet does not contain a private key, please re-select.
The query account failed. Please try again later.
The wallet does not contain an active key. Please re-import.
The wallet does not contain the full active permission key, please re-import.
The account name cannot be empty. Please re-enter.
The unlock password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The wallet password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The wallet password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The password is different, please re-enter.
The account name does not exist. Please re-enter.
The account name already exists. Please re-enter.
The password is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The private key is invalid. Please re-enter.
The private key is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The brain key is incorrect. Please re-enter.
Insufficient active permission, can not be imported.
The account format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
Registration is successful, but the refresh fails. You can log in directly later.
The registration is successful, but query account data failed. Please restart the app.

Tip: The password format can be viewed by clicking on the question mark. \nNote: New Bitshares is a decentralized blockchain application. Once the password is lost or forgotten, it will not be retrieved. Please keep it in a safe place.

Tip: The password format can be viewed by clicking on the question mark. \nNote: New Bitshares is a decentralized blockchain application. If the wallet file or password is lost or forgotten, it is not possible to retrieve it. It is recommended that you back up the wallet file after registration and keep it in a safe place. \n※ Wallet mode is recommended.
The device has too many registered accounts.
Registration is too frequent, please try again later.
The device does not support backup wallet files.
An unknown error has occurred and the wallet cannot be backed up. Please try again later.
Please enter the above URL on the computer to download the wallet BIN file and backup to a safe place.
The device network is abnormal. You cannot back up your wallet at this time. Please try again later.
Only supports backup wallets under WIFI network.
Logging out will delete the account information from the device, please confirm that you have made a backup. Do you want to continue logging out?
You don\'t have active permissions for account %s, do you want to create a proposal?
You don\'t have owner permissions for account %s, do you want to create a proposal?
Please select a proposal creator account.
Risk warning: The proposal was created by an unknown account.
Dangerous account %s, the system has blocked this operation for your account and financial security.
The proposal is in review. cannot add approval.
You do not have any permissions to perform an approval operation.
You have not approved it and do not need to remove it.
Please select to remove the approved account
Please select to add the approved account
Please select a fee paying account.
There is no active private key for %s, this account cannot be used to pay the fee.
The network request is abnormal and the evaluation failed. Please try again later.
%1$s submit a sell order. sell %3$s at %2$s.
%1$s submit a buy order. buy %3$s at %2$s.
You have not issued any assets. Click on the upper right corner to create an asset.
The asset has been global settled, and bitasset cannot be updated.
This asset has been global settled, cannot global settle again.

[Reminder] 
1. Asset symbol cannot be changed after creation. 
2. Asset precision is the number of decimal places supported by the asset. 
3. Asset precision cannot be changed after creation. 
4. The fee for creating an asset is determined by the length of the asset symbol.
[Reminder] \nOnce asset permissions are permanently disabled, they cannot be enabled subsequently.
Allow issuer to force a global settling
Witness feed and committee feed permission flags cannot be activated at the same time.
Please enter a valid asset symbol.
The length of the asset symbol ranges from 3 to 16.
The asset symbol must begin with a capital letter.
The asset symbol must end with an uppercase letter or number.
The asset symbol can only contain a decimal point symbol.
asset symbol can only contain numbers and letters.
Please enter the minimum number of feed.
Please enter the delay for forced settlements.
Please enter offset percent of forced settlements.
Please enter the max settle volume.
You have disabled some permissions permanently. This operation is irreversible, please proceed with caution. continue?
Creating %s assets is expected to cost %s, continue?
You need to create the prefix asset %2$s before creating the %1$s asset.
You do not have permission to create assets prefixed with %s.
Backing asset %s 's backing asset %s cannot be a smart coin.
The backing asset of the smart coin created by committee must be %s or backing by %s.

[Reminder]
1. Quickly swap %s assets in the order book. 
2. the swap ratio is 1:%s, if the market depth is insufficient, the swap will fail. 
3. There may be a slight error according to market conditions.
Please enter a valid swap amount.
【温馨提示】\n1、锁仓资产在到期之前不可取回，请谨慎操作。\n2、该资产不是挖矿资产，锁仓不会产生任何收益。

【温馨提示】
锁仓挖矿和 %s 挖矿共享同一个矿池奖励。
%s
※ 锁仓资产在到期之前不可取回，请谨慎操作。
请输入有效的锁仓数量。
您确认锁仓 %s %s 吗？\n\n※ 锁仓到期之前不可取回，请谨慎操作。
Withdrawal of staked funds %s is successful.
The asset has been disabled settlements.
This operations can only be performed after the global settlement of the prediction market.
The asset has no valid feed price and cannot be settlements.

[Reminder] 
1. The settlements operation forces the assets to be exchanged back to the backing assets. This operation is irreversible, please proceed with caution. 
2. after the settlements is initiated, it will be queued for execution after %s, and the transaction will be executed at the current settlement price. 
3. settlement price = feed price × %s
4. settlement fee = %s

[Reminder] 
1. The settlements operation forces the assets to be exchanged back to the backing assets. This operation is irreversible, please proceed with caution. 
2. The asset has been global settled, and the settlements operation will be executed immediately. 
3, settlement price = %s
4. settlement fee = %s
Please enter the amount of assets to be settled.
The reserve operation will reduce your corresponding assets and the current supply of the assets. This operation is irreversible, please exercise caution. Continue?
[Reminder] \nAfter the reserve operation, you will reduce the corresponding amount of assets and reduce the current supply of the assets. This operation is irreversible, please proceed with caution.
Please enter the amount of assets to be reserved.

[Reminder]
Lock position can increase voting power. This operation will cause the asset to be temporarily or permanently locked, please exercise caution.
1. 180 days, 2x voting power, activate after 15 days.
2. 360 days, 4x voting power, activate after 30 days.
3. 720 days, 8x voting power, activate after 45 days.
4. forever, 8x voting power, activate after 60 days. after activation, it decays by 25% every 180 days, and the voting power returns to 0 after 2 years of activation.

Are you sure to lock %s %s? 

Type: %s

※ This operation will cause the assets to be temporarily or permanently locked, please be careful.
The remaining amount of issues is insufficient.
Are you sure to issue %s %s to %s?
Are you sure to settle %s %s? \n\n※ After the settlements is initiated, it will be queued for execution and irrevocable. Please proceed with caution.
Are you sure to settle %s %s? \n\n※ The asset has been global settled, and the operation will be executed immediately and irrevocably. Please proceed with caution.
Are you sure to reserve %s %s? \n\n※ This operation is irreversible, please exercise caution.
[Reminder] \nAsset fee pool can be used to deduct network broadcasting fees. If the balance of the fee pool is insufficient, it cannot be deducted.
Please enter the amount of assets to claim.
[Reminder] \nClaim the income from the market trading fees of assets to account balance.
Please enter the amount of assets to claim.
[Reminder] \nClaim the fee income from the force-settlement fee or margin call fee.
[Reminder] \nGlobal settlements will forcibly close all positions at the settle price. This operation is irreversible, please exercise caution.
Are you sure to perform global settlements at the price of %s %s/%s ? \n\n※ This operation is irreversible, please exercise caution.
Order %s has been canceled, but refresh failed. Please try again later.
The grid order is empty, click on the upper right corner to create a grid.
The grid needs to be authorized for automated operations. Is it authorized?
The grid is running, please stop it first.
The order is no longer valid

[Reminder]
Set the grid order parameters.

 Note: Because running multiple grids at the same time may affect the calculation of grid revenue, it is recommended to use a separate account to run the grid, and one account should not run multiple grids at the same time.
Please select a quote asset first.
The quote asset and base asset cannot be the same.
Please set the number of grids.
The valid range of the number of grids is 2 ~ 99.
Please set the amount per grid.
Please reset the minimum price or maximum price value.
An order with the same parameters already exists, please adjust the parameters and try again.
The vesting balance can only be withdrawn after %s.
The vesting numbers is ZERO, please wait.
The vesting balance %s was successfully withdraw.
The limit order was created successfully.
The order was placed successfully and the order #%s has been completed.
The limit order was created successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
The order total is too low.
The send was successful, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
The FROM account and the TO account cannot be the same.
The account does not have a memo private key and does not support memo.
The wallet does not have a memo private key and does not support memo.
Please select the asset to transfer
Stealth transfer only supports wallet mode, do you create a local wallet file for the current account?
Missing the blind receipt private key.
The blind receipt information is invalid.
Please select the receipt with the same asset symbol.
Please enter the blind transfer receipt.

[Warm Tips]
Import receipts also support the receipts generated by the APP and CLI wallet receipt formats.

If the blind receipt is lost, you can try to directly import the block number corresponding to the transfer to import.

If a blind transfer is made through a proposal, a blind receipt will not be generated. After the proposal takes effect, directly enter the corresponding block number when creating the proposal and import it.

[Warm Tips]
Transfer to blind: transfer from the public account of New BitShares to the blind account. And can transfer to multiple blind accounts at the same time.

If a blind transfer is made through a proposal, a blind receipt will not be generated. After the proposal takes effect, directly enter the corresponding block number when creating the proposal and import it.

[Warm Tips]
Blind transfer: That is, transfer operations between multiple blind accounts.

Change and gift: the total amount of the receipt minus the total amount of the output, if the handling fee required for change is met, it will be automatically changed to my blind account, otherwise it will be automatically given to the first one blind account.
[Warm Tips]\nTransfer from blind: transfer from blind account to New BitShares public account.
Asset %s prohibits the stealth transfer feature.
The asset %s has a white list, and stealth transfers are prohibited.
You can only add up to %s blind outputs.
Are you sure you want to transfer %s %s to the blind account?\n\nNetwork fee: %s %s
Are you sure you want to transfer %2$s %3$s to a total of %1$s blind accounts?\n\nNetwork fee: %4$s %5$s
Please select the blind receipt first.
The CER of asset %s is not set correctly and cannot be transferred.
The total amount of the receipt is insufficient.

Are you sure you want to transfer %2$s %3$s to %1$s blind accounts?

Change: %4$s %5$s

Network fee: %6$s %7$s

Are you sure you want to transfer %2$s %3$s to %1$s blind accounts?

Gift: %4$s %5$s

Network fee: %6$s %7$s
Are you sure you want to transfer %2$s %3$s to %1$s blind accounts?\n\nNetwork fee: %4$s %5$s

[Warm Tips]\nBlind receipts are stealth transfer receipts, please backup them properly.\nIf it is transferred to your own blind account, the receipt will be automatically imported into the Blind receipts interface. If it is transferred to others blind account, you need to share the receipt with the target user and import the receipt.
The transfer is successful, please backup the receipt!
Receipt information is required to manage blind balance. Please confirm that you have backed up the above receipts, which can be saved by screenshots.
Please select the target account to be transferred out.
The receipt amount is too low. Insufficient to pay network fees.
Are you sure you want to transfer %s to %s account from your blind account?\n\nNetwork fee: %s %s
There is no blind receipt, you can click the upper right corner to import the receipt.
Set an alias for a blind account
Please enter the blind account password
Please enter a blind account alias.
Please enter a valid blind account password.
No blind account, you can click on the upper right corner to create or restore a blind account.
You can only create up to %s sub-accounts.。
The private key of the master account does not exist, please import again.
Please enter your or other blind account
Please enter a valid public key.
The receipt information is invalid and the TO address is unknown.
The receipt information is invalid. The private key does not exist.
The receipt information is invalid. Self verification failed.
The receipt information is invalid. On-chain verification failed.
Your blind account list is empty. Please go to the blind accounts interface to import your blind account first.
Successfully imported %s blind receipts, %s verification failed.
The preimage format is 20 characters or more and must contain both uppercase letters and numbers.
Please enter the preimage hash value.
Please enter a valid preimage hash value.
Near the expiration date of Contract A, there is a security risk and Contract B cannot be created. Please contact the other party to extend the contract expiry.
Please confirm that the \"Preimage\" has been backed up. If the preimage is lost, it only can be automatically unlocked after the contract expires. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
It is recommended that \"Expiry\" must be \"less than\" the expiry of the other party's contract for more than 2 days, otherwise it may cause asset loss. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
Proactively create a contract, please back up the \"preimage\". If the preimage is lost, it only can be automatically unlocked after the contract expires. Do you want to continue creating contracts?

Passive deployment contract please carefully confirm that the other party has deployed the same contract and carefully check the various parameters. 

※ Note ※
1. the preimage hash and the preimage length must match the other party perfectly. 
2. It is recommended that "Expiry" must be "less than" the expiry of the other party's contract for more than 2 days, otherwise it may cause asset loss. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
The HTLC was created successfully, view the HTLC details on the \"My Balance\".
The HTLC was created successfully, but the refresh interface failed. You can view the HTLC details on the \"My Balance\".
The HTLC related parameters committees have not been configured, please try again later.
It has reached the maximum expiry and cannot be extended any longer.
Extend the expiry %s days and do not reduce it after the extension. Whether to continue?
The preimage hash has been copied: %s
The voting information has not changed. No need to submit.
You set up a voting proxy. Manually editing the voting information will cancel the proxy and continue to vote?
%s successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
It is currently the latest version.
The connection failed. Please try again later.
In use, please switch to another node first.
The connection failed. Please check the URL again.
This node is not a New BitShares main network node, please enter it again.
The account already exists. Please do not import it again.
Keep at least one account in your wallet.
Deleting an account will be deleted along with the private key associated with the account. Please confirm that you have made a backup. Do you want to continue deleting?
You can only import up to %s accounts.
%s is not a multi-signed account and cannot be imported.
%1$s submit a sell order. sell %3$s at %2$s.
%1$s submit a buy order. buy %3$s at %2$s.
%s add %s to the whitelist and blacklist.
%s remove %s from the black and white list.
HTLC expires. assets are automatically returned to %s. #%s
Memo: unlock wallet to view memo message.
Memo: this memo message cannot be viewed.
亲爱的用户您好，如果您需要使用场外交易服务，需要仔细阅读并同意以下协议。
系统维护中，请稍后再试。
商家制度未分配，请稍后再试。
该功能需要先激活商家账号后才可使用，激活需要 %s%s 作为保证金，可在商家资产里转入。
激活失败，请往商家账号转入足够的保证金。
账号 %s 为商家备用账号，不可进入后台。
多签账号不支持场外交易。
场外交易暂不支持任何数字资产，请稍后再试。
场外交易暂时不支持 %s 资产，请稍后再试。
服务器或网络异常，请稍后再试。
服务器或网络异常，请稍后再试。错误代码：%s
请求太频繁，请稍后再试。
您的身份信息已经绑定其他NBS账号。
请退出场外交易界面重新登录。
已经存在相同类型的广告。
价格已变化，请重新下单。
该广告存在未完成的订单。
交易数量低于最小限量。
交易数量高于最大限量。
今日取消订单数量过多。
商家账号手续费不足，请转入对应NBS手续费后继续操作。
未完成订单数达到上限。
验证发送太多，请稍后再试。
验证码不正确或已过期。
请不要重复发送验证码。
您已转币，正在等待区块确认。
区块已确认转币，等待商家付款。
请查收对方付款，未收到请勿放行。
区块确认异常，请联系客服。
商家无法接单，退币处理中。
您已付款，请等待商家确认并放币。
商家已转币，正在等待区块确认。
商家转币已确认，请查收。
商家无法接单，已退款，请查收退款。
区块确认异常，请联系客服。
用户已下单，等待用户转币。
用户已转币，正在等待区块确认。
区块已确认转币，请付款给用户。
您已付款，等待用户放行。
您无法接单，平台退币中。
用户已下单，等待用户付款。
用户已付款，请确认并放币。
平台已验证，区块确认中。
您已退款，等待用户确认。
您的账号已被冻结，是否联系客服？
在继续操作之前您需要先完成身份认证，是否继续？
添加收款方式之前，请先完成身份认证，是否继续？
您尚未完成身份认证，不可进行场外交易，是否去认证？
商家没开启任何收款方式。
商家没开启任何付款方式。
商家仅支持通过【%s】向您付款，您需要前往添加并激活对应收款方式，是否继续？
您当前选择的订单价格有变动，是否继续下单？
下单成功，请在 10 分钟内完成转币。
下单成功，请在 10 分钟内完成付款。
没有任何需处理的订单
确定转币给商家。是否继续？
我确认已登录收款账户查看，并核对收款无误。是否放行？
※ 如果您已经付款给商家，请不要取消订单！！！\n\n注：若用户当日累计取消3笔订单，会限制当日下单功能。是否继续？
我确认已按要求付款给商家。\n注：恶意点击将会被冻结账号。\n是否继续？
我确认已登录原付款账户查看，并核对退款无误。是否继续？
我由于个人原因无法接单，同意退币给用户。\n\n注：确定后将直接转帐给用户。拒绝接单将会影响您的订单完成率。是否继续？
我确认已按要求付款给用户。\n注：恶意点击将会被冻结账号。\n是否继续？
我确认已登录收款账户查看，并核对收款无误。是否放行？
我确认已从原路径退款给用户。\n\n注：拒绝接单将会影响您的订单完成率。恶意点击将直接冻结账号。是否继续？
请在 %s 内付款给卖家。
预计 %s 内收到用户付款。
系统：在转账过程中请勿备注BTC、USDT等信息，防止汇款被拦截、银行卡被冻结等问题。
订单数据异常，请联系客服。
请使用本人%s的%s向以下账户自行转账
请使用本人名字的%s向以下账户自行转账
的%s向以下账户自行转账
没有任何广告信息，点击右上角发布广告。
请选择交易的数字资产。
最大限额必须大于最小限额。
